channel.title: Small cache problem!
channel.description: I am using Aggroth V4 and I was changing the cache. I put the cache link in the right places and when I run the client this comes up; http://prntscr.com/7q3yd2 It's something to do with the zip file not opening? This is my cache link, is it alright? https://www.dropbox.com/s/9kjosg7agbpyiyp/.AudaciousCache.zip?dl=0

item.title: Small cache problem!
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

[quote=“rite4dead, post:1, topic:552369”]I am using Aggroth V4 and I was changing the cache. I put the cache link in the right places and when I run the client this comes up;

Lightshot

Screenshot

Captured with Lightshot


It’s something to do with the zip file not opening?
This is my cache link, is it alright? https://www.dropbox.com/s/9kjosg7agbpyiyp/.AudaciousCache.zip?dl=0[/quote]
The cache link is bad.
The easiest way to test if the link is good or not is to simply click it.

If it instantly starts to download a zip file, then it’s a good link.
If it takes you to any form of page (That is NOT a blank white page) then it’s not the correct one.
As you can see when you click that link, it takes you to a dropbox webpage. Which means we don’t want it.

This link, however, should work.
https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/s/9kjosg7agbpyiyp/.AudaciousCache.zip

Read full topic
